meta.review_content: Trying to block a stolen phone using Vodacom's Customer Care (082 135) and all I get is a useless Chatbot (Toby) who keeps me in an endless loop of not blacklisting the phone. The service gets to the point of correctly identifying the phones which my sim was used for. But is unable to progress from there. Utterly useless.
